name: Fomorobo GoldLitan
description: “Fomorobo GoldLitan” Design by 8e88 Graphic in concept “Assemble My Childhood Memories” Arts series. Inspired/Tribute “Golden Warrior Gold Lightan” ‘80s Japan robot, Original Character design by Ippei Kuri. “Gold Lightan” is usually disguised as a tiny gold Zippo-style lighter pocket. When called upon, Gold Lightan transforms into a giant robot towering at 30 meters and weighing 200 tons. | Size: 3500x3500 pixels
